name: Pir4te - Builder Playtest
description:
Ahoy!

This is the playtest of the modular building system I entirely created for my Pir4te game. I'm so glad you can finally try it!
Few elements to keep in mind:

  • For any feedback and building share, join the Discord! 
  • The main objective of this playtest is to detect bugs and potential improvements in the building system
  • As a playtest, this version of the game contains only the building system. No navigation, no combat, very poor level design, etc.
  • This playtest is not at all representative of what the final game will be, both in terms of gameplay and visual appearance. The name Pir4te itself will not be the name of the final game

That said, thank you so much for being here, I hope you'll enjoy the building system!

Sw4n
